# Python cache files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*.pyo
*.pyd

# Virtual environment folders
env/
venv/
.venv/

# IDE/editor folders
.vscode/
.idea/

# Environment variables and secret files
.env
*.env

# Django specific
*.log
staticfiles/
media/

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Database files (if using SQLite â€” you're using MySQL, so it's okay)
db.sqlite3

# Compiled files
*.so
*.egg
*.egg-info/

build/

# Pycharm project files
*.iml
